sections.name: dataset-description
sections.definition: Dataset-description-template template schema generated by the CEDAR Template Editor 2.6.56

sections.name: in2pb-header
sections.definition: Header to be used for metadata templates created for In2PB projects.

properties.name: in2pb-header
properties.definition: Header to be used for metadata templates created for In2PB projects.

sections.name: dataset-description-header
sections.definition: Header with instructions for the dataset description metadata.

properties.name: dataset-description-header
properties.definition: Header with instructions for the dataset description.

properties.name: title
properties.definition: Name of the dataset.

properties.name: description
properties.definition: A brief abstract describing the dataset.

properties.name: datasetType
properties.definition: The type(s) of data present in the dataset.

properties.name: datasetLicense
properties.definition: The open-source license associated with the use of the dataset being described. Use this URL to choose a creative commons license: https://chooser-beta.creativecommons.org/

properties.name: otherDatasetLicense
properties.definition: Use this field to specify the license name and URL if "other" is used in the field above.

properties.name: acknowledgements
properties.definition: Text acknowledging contributions of individuals or institutions beyond those listed in authors or funding.

properties.name: howToAcknowledge
properties.definition: Text containing instructions on how researchers using this dataset should acknowledge the original authors. This field can also be used to define a publication that should be cited in publications that use the dataset.

properties.name: funding
properties.definition: List of sources of funding. Please use grant numbers wherever possible.

properties.name: ethicsApproval
properties.definition: Specifies documented ethics approval for animal experiments, ensuring compliance with ethical and welfare standards. Required to demonstrate adherence to ethical guidelines and humane treatment of animals.

properties.name: datasetDOI
properties.definition: Indicate the dataset's unique Digital Object Identifier (DOI), ensuring it refers to the dataset itself rather than any associated publications. Format DOIs as valid URIs, starting with 'doi:' followed by the identifier.

properties.name: firstName
properties.definition: First name of the author.

properties.name: lastName
properties.definition: Last name of the author.

properties.name: authorAffiliation
properties.definition: Affiliation of the author.

properties.name: authorIdentifier
properties.definition: DIgital identifier of the author such as the ORCID. Include the prefix to indicate its type.

sections.name: in2pb-element
sections.definition: List of In2PrimateBrains entities that contributed to this dataset.

properties.name: in2pbProject
properties.definition: PhD project associated with In2PB entity. To be left empty for partner entity.

properties.name: refernceIdentifier
properties.definition: Digital identifier (e.g., DOI, arXiv, PMID, URL) of the refernce if possible.  Add a prefix to the ID, separated by a colon, to indicate the type of identifier. If assignment of an identifier is pending, enter "doi:tba" as placeholder.

properties.name: referenceType
properties.definition: The relationship of this dataset to the referenced resource.

properties.name: referenceCitation
properties.definition: Please provide the full reference, including title, authors, journal etc., like in the reference section of a paper. If an unpublished manuscript is referenced, enter as much citation information as available, and update when the paper is published.

sections.name: dataset-experiment-element
sections.definition: An overview description of the experiment, the data was recorded from.

properties.name: animalModel
properties.definition: List of animal model(s) the recorded data is from.

properties.name: recordingRegion
properties.definition: List of anatomical regions the nerual data is recorded from.

properties.name: recordingProtocol
properties.definition: Electrophysiological assays that were used to generate the data.

sections.name: free-text-field
sections.definition: A free text element to allow the user to provide any additional information.

properties.name: free-text-field
properties.definition: A free text element to allow the user to provide any additional information.
